con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="ReportingAdminAdapter" targetNamespace="http://reporting.directrecharge.o2.com/ws/admin/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://reporting.directrecharge.o2.com/ws/admin/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:adminType="http://reporting.directrecharge.o2.com/ws/admin/type/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import schemaLocation="ReportingAdmin.xsd" namespace="http://reporting.directrecharge.o2.com/ws/admin/type/"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--define messages--> <wsdl:message name="fault"> <wsdl:part element="adminType:fault" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createReportDataFrame"> <wsdl:part element="adminType:createReportDataFrame" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createReportDataFrameResponse"> <wsdl:part element="adminType:createReportDataFrameResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="triggerJobManager"> <wsdl:part element="adminType:triggerJobManager" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="triggerJobManagerResponse"> <wsdl:part element="adminType:triggerJobManagerResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="invalidateByLongKeys"> <wsdl:part element="adminType:invalidateByLongKeys" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="invalidateByLongKeysResponse"> <wsdl:part element="adminType:invalidateByLongKeysResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="invalidateAll"> <wsdl:part element="adminType:invalidateAll" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="invalidateAllResponse"> <wsdl:part element="adminType:invalidateAllResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <!--define the port type of the wsdl (the port type name is responsible for the generated ws-interface)--> <wsdl:portType name="ReportingAdminPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="createReportDataFrame"> <wsdl:input message="tns:createReportDataFrame" name="createReportDataFrame"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:createReportDataFrameResponse" name="createReportDataFrameResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:fault" name="fault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="triggerJobManager"> <wsdl:input message="tns:triggerJobManager" name="triggerJobManager"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:triggerJobManagerResponse" name="triggerJobManagerResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:fault" name="fault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="invalidateByLongKeys"> <wsdl:input message="tns:invalidateByLongKeys" name="invalidateByLongKeys"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:invalidateByLongKeysResponse" name="invalidateByLongKeysResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:fault" name="fault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="invalidateAll"> <wsdl:input message="tns:invalidateAll" name="invalidateAll"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:invalidateAllResponse" name="invalidateAllResponse"/> <wsdl:fault message="tns:fault" name="fault"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="ReportingAdminSoapBinding" type="tns:ReportingAdminPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="createReportDataFrame"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="createReportDataFrame"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="createReportDataFrameResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="triggerJobManager"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="triggerJobManager"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="triggerJobManagerResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="invalidateByLongKeys"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="invalidateByLongKeys"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="invalidateByLongKeysResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="invalidateAll"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="invalidateAll"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="invalidateAllResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ReportingAdminService"> <wsdl:port name="ReportingAdminServicePort" binding="tns:ReportingAdminSoapBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/reporting/ws/ReportingAdminService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://reporting.directrecharge.o2.com/ws/admin/type/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://reporting.directrecharge.o2.com/ws/admin/type/"> <!--create report data frame--> <xs:element name="createReportDataFrame"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="tenantIdList" type="tenantIdList"/> <xs:element name="reportTypeList" type="reportTypeList"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="tenantIdList"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="tenantId" type="xs:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="reportTypeList"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="value" type="reportType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="reportType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="MONTHLY_SUM_OF_DEBTS"/> <xs:enumeration value="MONTHLY_LIST_OF_DEBTS"/> <xs:enumeration value="MONTHLY_SUM_OF_RECONCILED_PAYMENTS"/> <xs:enumeration value="MONTHLY_LIST_OF_RECONCILED_PAYMENTS"/> <xs:enumeration value="MONTHLY_SUM_OF_DEBTS_AGAINST_ACQUIRER"/> <xs:enumeration value="MONTHLY_AGGREGATE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="createReportDataFrameResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="reportDataFrameList" type="reportDataFrameList"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="reportDataFrameList"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="reportDataFrame" type="reportDataFrame" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="reportDataFrame"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="startDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="endDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--trigger taskCollector--> <xs:element name="triggerJobManager" type="triggerJobManagerType"/> <xs:complexType name="triggerJobManagerType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="jobName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="repeat" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="triggerJobManagerResponse" type="triggerJobManagerResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="triggerJobManagerResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="taskId" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="invalidateByLongKeys"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="group" type="invalidationGroupEnum"/> <xs:element name="longKeyList" type="longKeyListType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="invalidateByLongKeysResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="clusterSynchronized" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="invalidateAll"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="group" type="invalidationGroupEnum"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="invalidateAllResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="clusterSynchronized" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="invalidationGroupEnum"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SETTINGS"/> <xs:enumeration value="CONFIGURATION"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="longKeyListType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="longKey" type="xs:long" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="fault" type="faultType"/> <xs:complexType name="faultType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="specificFaultType" type="xs:string" default="UNSPECIFIED"/> <xs:element name="errorMessage" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="errorCode" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
